This stripped down mini-reactor is more efficient and safer than the base model due to integrated radiation cleansers.  There is no way to shut it down once active, but you can toggle additional fuel intake.
This set of tanks and filters allows you to extract plutonium from radioactive slurry.
Triggers an emergency reactor fuel purge that ejects all fuel from your reactor.
This stripped down mini-reactor generates impressive amounts of bionic power.  There is no way to shut it down, but you can toggle additional fuel intake.  Irradiates your body when active.
When this bionic is active, you can burn nearly any organic material as fuel (use 'E'), recharging your power level.  Some materials will burn better than others.
A kit for upgrading a pre-installed microreactor with enhanced maximum yield and limited automatic radiation scrubbing capabilities.
